exceptions.exn: In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 a, b : nat Unable to unify "S (rem ?M1411 ?M1412) <= ?M1412" with "S b <= p".
In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 a, b : nat Unable to unify "p <> 0" with "b < p".

original: assert (H: rem b p = b). { apply rem_idem. apply div_rem_spec2. apply Hp. } rewrite H. rewrite Nat.add_mod_idemp_r. - reflexivity. - apply Hp.
